title: Early '80 video titling Type ID
content:
Early '80 video titling Type ID

In early '80 in Italy, this font was used for a video titling of a japanese cartoon.  
What type is it?  
What type machine or technics could be used to do such a kind of title?  
This type was used after in '80 and '90 for titling video. Maybe can it be stored in such a digital video titler?  
Thank you.

[http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/6092/4b3s.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131211032132/http:/img594.imageshack.us/img594/6092/4b3s.png "http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/6092/4b3s.png")
author: sexybird
